name: Hexa-gone (GanyDevStuffs)
description:
This game is just a little game where you have to press some keys to rotate the ball and dodge the hexagons to score. This game is made by a learning game developer and not an experienced developer so if you find any bugs or glitches in the game please let me know my contacts are inside the game itself and if you want to contact me further you can DM me in discord (Ganymede#9409) and i will surely try to reply you. This version of the game is the pc version but the android version will be soon available.

Have a great day!
